name: NZMP (USA) / Fonterra North America Coloured Cheddar Cheese
description: NZMP (USA) / Fonterra North America Colored Cheddar Cheese is a semi-hard, rindless cheese. Sometimes referred to as Red Cheddar, this has a mild flavor, smooth texture and a firm body. A natural beta-carotene coloring is added to the cheese in order to achieve a uniform and distinctive orange color.
